pages.title: Cloud in a Jar
pages.text: A jar once meant to hold the softness of clouds... but even the skies could not be tamed. $(p)It feels as if you could leap once more, using the clouds themselves as your footing.
$(7)Acquisition:$(br)$()This item cannot be crafted. It can only be discovered during your adventures. $(p)ยง7Tip:ยงf Put cloud in a glass jar!
